mapper.select: SELECT g.*, t.id AS "E_ID", t.growth_id, t.lv AS "LEVEL", t.experience, t.updated_at AS "E_UPDATED_AT", t.created_at AS "E_CREATED_AT" FROM growth g LEFT JOIN total_experience t ON g.id = t.growth_id OFFSET ((#{page} - 1) * #{size}) ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT g.*, t.id AS "E_ID", t.growth_id, t.lv AS "LEVEL", t.experience, t.updated_at AS "E_UPDATED_AT", t.created_at AS "E_CREATED_AT" FROM growth g LEFT JOIN total_experience t ON g.id = t.growth_id WHERE g.id = #{id}

SELECT id FROM growth WHERE
id = #{id}
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM growth WHERE id = #{id}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO growth ( id, name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name} )

INSERT INTO growth ( id, name )
SELECT #{item.id}, #{item.name} FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO total_experience ( id, growth_id, lv, experience ) SELECT total_experience_seq.nextval, a.* FROM (
SELECT #{item.growthId} AS growth_id, #{item.level} AS lv, #{item.experience} AS experience FROM dual ) a
